highlights.title: Device Orientation Detection
highlights.problem: UI locked in portrait mode while video required automatic landscape full-screen.
highlights.solution: Developed native Flutter plugin using accelerometer and motion sensors to detect real-time orientation.
highlights.result: Accurate full-screen transitions without changing system rotation settings.

highlights.title: Pagination Optimization
highlights.problem: Severe performance drops on low-end devices due to heavy blur rendering.
highlights.solution: Removed heavy blur rendering from list views.

highlights.title: Arabic Search Normalization
highlights.problem: Multiple Unicode representations caused incorrect search results.
highlights.solution: Normalized Arabic characters and removed diacritics.
highlights.result: Accurate and consistent Arabic search behavior.
